About

Myself

27 year old native to Arizona, I grew up always looking for change. Whether that was in sports throughout school or work throughout my career, I always look for new challenges. Changes can come from simply changing my daily routine or looking for new doors / opportunities within my job.

While I do enjoy meeting and talking to new people with similar interests, I am the definition of a homebody. During my free time, I truly enjoy spending time with my amazing girlfriend Jessica, our dorky doberman Anubis and our rageful loving cat Blair.

Coding

Starting towards the end of 2018, I enrolled in a 12 week coding bootcamp at the University of Arizona. I finished and got my completition certificate in 2019. I spent 2019 coding during my free time while learning and adjusting to a recent promotion. In 2020 I continued coding during my free time amid working two jobs majority of the year. Come 2021, the company I worked for was bought out and I spent the year working with new coworkers and managers remotely in teaching them how to use our companies technology and systems.

Ending 2021, I've come to realize my love and enjoyment for coding. To have a UI design in front of me and planning out how to turn the design to code is a fun and exciting challenge for me. I get this same feeling whenever I draw and or plate a new meal I've cooked. With more free time, I've made the decision to work my way into the tech field as a Frontend Web Developer.
